content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM obtains most of your personal data from you, such as through the forms and applications that you fill out in connection with your employment or its termination (for example, if you fill out a job application). In addition, EPAM may obtain personal data about you from other sources, such as public authorities, suppliers (e.g. of background check- and security screening-services) and insurance companies, but only to the extent permitted by Swedish law. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
